page.title: 10OUR SCHOOL.
page.content: Our school has had lots of plays we have done Cinderella, Snow White, Mother Goose and Aladdin last year we did Jack and the Beanstalk, I was a stage hand and I got all the props ready for the performance. I had to pass the props on to the stage. Next morning we had to tidy the mess up, my friend Joanne was a boom operator. Tracy Ellis and Melanie Rennie were in the cow, Leanne Champan was the dame, and Stephen Jeffrey was her son Jack. On the 22nd May the choir are singing in a concert at school. I like singing in the choir. Each year our school goes to Whitby we have won the shield 3 times in the Primary school orchestra class. We play violins, cellos, trebles, tenors, descant recorders, flutes, clarinets, cornets, a tenor horn,percussion and xylophone. JULIE STEPHENSON AGE 10
